attributes.action: All key workers to receive a 25% wage increase or a bonus during the coronavirus
attributes.additional_details: Without these key workers this country would come a standstill.A lot of key workers are only receiving minimum wage which isnt acceptable when they are on the front line every day during this outbreak.Risking their lives helping others.
attributes.background: All key workers should receive a 25% wage increase or at least a bonus for putting, not only their own lives at risk but their families too.For continuing to work throughout this covid-19 outbreak.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions calling for the same action:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/306845
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/307215

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
